Haptic Tools

Classes

class  cGeneric3dofPointer
 cGeneric3dofPointer represents a haptic tool that can apply forces in three degrees of freedom and maintains three or six degrees of device pose.
More...
class  cGenericTool
 cGenericTool describes a generic class to create virtual tools inside a virtual environment (cWorld) and connecting them to haptic devices. More...
